item.title: Android 4.0 Galaxy Nexus impressive boot animation
item.description: Have you been impressed by the startup boot animation for Android ICS â€“ I wonder if other Android 4.0 devices have the same startup animation?

item.title: I just got my Google Galaxy Nexus
item.description: Looking forward to some Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich now I got me a new phone. The Google Galaxy Nexusarrived today and all I can say is BIG SCREEN. I think the next year will see me managing projects involving NFC, mobile payments, banking and hoping for some great Internet of Things apps.
